tooltip.crazyenchant.fish_hater: - Makes fish harder to catch and junk more common.
tooltip.crazyenchant.random_effect: - Grants a random potion effect on hit.
tooltip.crazyenchant.witch_hunter: - Witch drop enchanted books when killed.
jei.crazyenchant.fish_hater.line1: Reduces the chance of catching fish.
jei.crazyenchant.fish_hater.line2: Applies while fishing with a rod.
jei.crazyenchant.fish_hater.line3: Fish become rarer and junk more common.
jei.crazyenchant.fish_hater.line4: Luck of the Sea effects are inverted.
jei.crazyenchant.multihits.line1: Allow attacks to hit multiple times.
jei.crazyenchant.random_effect.line3: Applies a random effect to the target.
jei.crazyenchant.silkfortune.line3: Drops silk-touch results with bonus yield.
jei.crazyenchant.silkfortune.line4: May conflict with certain loot tables.
jei.crazyenchant.steal_effect.line3: Transfers active effects to the attacker.
jei.crazyenchant.swift_flight.line2: Applies while the user is flying.
jei.crazyenchant.swift_flight.line4: Boosts movement speed in all directions.
jei.crazyenchant.witch_hunter.line1: Causes Witches to drop enchanted books.
jei.crazyenchant.witch_hunter.line4: Enchantments can reach up to level 10.
